bill.title: Public Land Development Corporation; DLNR; Appropriation
bill.description: Establishes the public land development corporation to administer an appropriate and culturally-sensitive public land development program. Allows the HCDA to provide assistance to the public land development corporation. Appropriates funds for the corporation and three staff positions. (CD1)

history.action: (S) Introduced.
